title: ARTIST 3D
tagsAndSkills: Hospitality,3D,Artificial Intelligence,Machine learning,Texturing,HTTP,Photoshop,Android
jobDescription:
Were looking for proficient 3D Artists, who can work in a variety of areas such as 3D modeling, texturing, rendering environments, compositing, lighting, and dynamics to create exciting and innovative experiences in 3D. The ability to work within and across large, interdependent teams is a must, so the right person will have an implicit understanding of the balance needed between artistry, communication, and partnership.

The ideal candidate will be accomplished in working with a variety of 2D and 3D software packages and demonstrates the ability to raise the quality bar in modeling and texturing static 3D objects. You must be able to build a near-perfect model from just a single or small

Eligibility Requirements

College Diploma/Degree in graphic design, 3D, video game development or equivalent training.

Minimum 1 year industry experience in 3D modelling/Design with industry 3D packages, 3DSMax,

Knowledge of UV unwrapping and texture and Blend shape.

Excellent knowledge of real-time modelling techniques (shaders, PBR, normal, displacement etc.)

Strong portfolio showing 3D art skills and demonstrating a high level of artistic creativity.

Experience on modelling design of male/female humanoid.

Strong high low-resolution modelling and texturing skills.

Familiarity with AR mobile application, game development cycle.

Knowledge of Python, MEL, MAX Script an asset

Design and build Android mobile applications.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyse, design, and ship new features.

Fully responsible for mobile app development in the team

Build and publish applications in app stores.

Implement new technologies to maximize application performance.

title: Opening For Purchase Executive - APIs, Ghatkopar East. ONLY Females
tagsAndSkills: Purchase,Vendor Development,Dispatch Planning,Raw Material Procurement,Price Negotiation,Inventory Control,Supplier Evaluation,Purchase Order

ambitionBoxData.Title: Aarambh Life Science Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Hope you are doing well.


This is in reference to your CV uploaded on Naukri.com


We are into exports of Pharmaceutical Raw Materials and there is opening for Purchase executive for APIs


Job Description:

- Purchase of Pharmaceutical Raw Materials

- Negotiating with manufacturers for price, delivery and payments.

- Identifying new suppliers.

- Comparing different supplier prices.

- Making and updating records of products and suppliers.

- Monitoring of pending payment of supplier & co-ordination with Account department of timely release of payment.

- Making a Purchase Order and placing the order with the suppliers.

- Follow up with the factory for Dispatch and pass the same info to the Logistics department.

- Follow up with the factory for sample dispatches and updating records to the supplier on the quality of the samples.

- Taking relevant documents from manufacturers required for customs and export purposes.

- Planning deliveries & dispatches and co-ordination with the Logistics department for the same.

- Evaluate supplier performance based on quality standards, delivery time & best prices and ensure all the criteria are met according to the customers requirements and expectation


Min Exp : 3 Years in Pharma API Purchase


If you are looking for a change, please let us have your updated CV for the same on hr@aarambhlifescience.com or WhatsApp on 90822 34914


Also, if any of your colleagues or friends are looking to take new opportunities, please do let us know.


Hope to hear from you soon.
